title: Just got a new laptop and now my minimap and cursor are extremely small in game.
body:
So I recently got a new laptop (https://www.asus.com/us/Notebooks/ASUS-ZenBook-UX303UB/) and I've been loving it so far but I have some problems that've been affecting me a lot in and out of game.

In game, my minimap and cursor are a lot smaller than normal and it's hard to play like that. My settings box is also really small so I have to put my face super close to my screen in order to read it. My chat also used to be tiny but I fixed that by adjusting the resolution (1920x1080 IIRC).

When I'm not in game, the box that shows up when I hover over someone on my friend's list is super tiny and the graphics in the store are kinda pixely (which isn't a big issue, just weird since my 7 year old laptop displays it fine).

I think maybe it's a windows 10 issue? The icons in TeamSpeak are super small as well and some things (like facebook) are super zoomed in. I'm not really tech savvy at all so I'm not sure how to diagnose the problem really. Overall though, most regular web pages like youtube are fine. Just games and other apps. Does anyone know a fix? Is this a problem with all high resolution monitors? Thanks in advance!

replies.body: Indeed, a recent windows update seems to have caused some resolution issues for some players.  No worries, there is a work around!  Right click the LoL icon -> Properties -> Compatibility Tab -> Check the "Disable Display Scaling on High DPI Settings" Box.  Also, be sure to update your drivers!  This should fix things up!

I tried that but all it does is make my client really tiny for some reason (the store, log in screen, etc.) and it doesn't actually fix the problem of my mouse/minimap/settings box being really small. :(

The only other reason I could see this happening is with a 4K monitor, which I don't think could be the case on a laptop.  Go head and grab a set of logs with the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  Attach those logs in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look into this for you.  We'll reply to your ticket asap!
